value.title: Embed/ Add LIVE Power BI reports in PowerPoint (free solution)

value.title: Export Power BI to MS Word / PDF | Paginated reports with Power Automate and Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to export a Power BI file to word or PDF and email it to somebody!!
